product_name: Green Guru Cruiser Cooler Reycled Bike Tube Handlebar Bag
long_description: The Green Guru Cruiser Cooler Reycled Bike Tube handlebar bag offers a convenient, insulated place for a few beverages or your lunch, whether you're commuting to work or riding to a picnic.
